DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , tolerability efficacy darifenacin , long-term treatment adult patient overactive bladder .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-Term Safety , Tolerability Efficacy Study Darifenacin Adult Patients With Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Adult patient overactive bladder complete previous darifenacin shortterm trial . Patients capable independent toileting able independently complete patient diary . Patients use anticholinergic drug contraindicate Evidence severe liver disease Patients clinically significant urinary gynecological condition Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
DOC.keyword: Overactive Bladder , incontinence , antimuscarinic , darifenacin , long-term treatment
